Multiple stack chart in Vega forked from [here](https://vega.github.io/vega/examples/stacked-area-chart/) with a population data from [vega datasets](https://vega.github.io/vega-datasets/)

See it in the [vega online editor](https://vega.github.io/editor/#-RwTAQAg80wEImjUlqCQiMSSY7485IMhkRR8TBWQJiSlvQnEiXkmSYSbiCAAMzYigQeJAmAAnjhziaaDY1fcZJ4cPd0MKGAhKDa4C5tABeEPaeT1eQgOXWu0KpUqihqwLKtgMHBMG1lGEzDWeQL2sF+dHR232momMzmZOKVPpzNQ7PVLEgR1wGyDdAF3yzS7jVCgVvt8t5mTmu5-fKFanoXs3cdHA4Y5vQIoKK2Vc4eFdFg2xnX2cYyI059AhMIwQKyNjIBb9uS8l7x1XqmSDjuNqPRjc1G3b2al847AcFxAmPc44gSQ8QHEQw2kNVoZAALzgGs0HguBEWvJBb1AYUUHQRVlWfQZXxoNt3xtdpPxOaCzhqKA2Bsc1AgAmox3sIpQKmE8QHqNUyHNTNMJvDRcIfAin0TF8WzIocZzzTEZCQDw1yhUBzTI8Q+z6NhsGvDV6iLdAt0M-86CMkBNBzJCBjzDpow095tL8E0oL-).
